actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to build capacity for counter-unmanned aircraft systems operations.
short_title: Strengthening Counter-Unmanned Aircraft Systems Operations (C-UAS) Partnerships Act

summary.text:
Strengthening Counter-Unmanned Aircraft Systems Operations (C-UAS) Partnerships Act

This bill authorizes the Department of Defense to conduct or support a program to provide training and equipment to the national security forces of one or more foreign countries for the purpose of building the capacity of such forces to conduct counter-unmanned aircraft systems operations.

titles.title: Strengthening Counter-Unmanned Aircraft Systems Operations (C-UAS) Partnerships Act
Strengthening Counter-Unmanned Aircraft Systems Operations (C-UAS) Partnerships Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Defense to build capacity for counter-unmanned aircraft systems operations.
